name: Bob vs Zombies! (and other stuffs!)
description:
In a world where Zombies (and other stuff) have taken over the world. One man must step up to the plate...........BOB!. 

Bob is your average 9-5 worker, has 5 cats, no love life, living with mum kinda guy...............................................except hes a NINjA!

that's right you heard me he's a motherflipping ninja. with awesome throwing star techniques he learnt from the interwebs. 

now guide bob through one level that has a few slimes in it, not even any zombies. I mean who even made this S$%t. 

Controls are W - Up  A - Left  S - Down D - Right 

                           Left mouse click - Fire Shuriken 

                          Right mouse click - Use Sword (Coming Soon)

It's still in prototype mode so a lot of missing things yet to be added and not even an end to level one but any feedback is welcome, this is my first go with unity so ya know, go a little easy :)
